const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;// Change this when deploying
export const uploadResume=async file=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append("resume",file);const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/upload`,{method:"POST",body:formData});return response.json();};export const fetchJobs=async skills=>{const response=await fetch(`${API_BASE_URL}/get_jobs`,{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({skills})});return response.json();};
